titleStmt.title: The reports and arguments of that learned judge Sir John Vaughan Kt. late chief justice of His Majesties court of Common Pleas being all of them special cases and many wherein he pronounced the resolution of the whole court of common pleas ; at the time he was chief justice there / published by his son Edward Vaughan, Esq.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Common Pleas.
Vaughan, John, Sir, 1603-1674.
Vaughan, Edward, d. 1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Roycroft for Richard Marriott to be sold by Thomas Basset and George Marriott ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
